lead_paragraph: Operators of 27 oil and natural gas wastewater disposal wells in northwest Oklahoma must reduce volume about 18 percent because of the swarm of moderate earthquakes in the past week.
snippet: Operators of 27 oil and natural gas wastewater disposal wells in northwest Oklahoma must reduce volume about 18 percent because of the swarm of moderate earthquakes in the past week.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Cuts Ordered for Wastewater Wells
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Cuts Ordered for Wastewater Wells

abstract: Oklahoma Corporation Commission indicates that swarm of moderate earthquakes could be linked to subsurface injection of wastewater from drilling operations and instructs well operators to reduce volume about 18 percent.
